Title: Heart Shaped Box
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Michelle Paradise, Christopher Hollier, Declan De Barra (executive story editor), Ashley Lyle (executive story editor), Bart Nickerson (executive story editor), Michael Russo (executive story editor), Carina Adly MacKenzie (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Aurora uses Freya as bait to lure the Mikaelson brothers into a trap.
